channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: A 13.3-Inch Color E Ink Display Is Both the Best and Worst Thing About This eReader
item.dc:creator: Timothy Jacob Hudson
item.description: The Boox Tab X C is an e-reader with an e-ink screen so huge it's both amazing and terrible all at once.
item.content:encoded: The Boox Tab X C is a massive e-reader, sporting one of the largest e-ink screens on the market. While it comes with a hefty price, it includes a lot of great features for e-reader lovers. However, it's not without a few grating performance issues.

item.title: 3 Raspberry Pi Projects to Try This Weekend
item.dc:creator: Patrick Campanale
item.description: You won't spend all weekend configuring your Pi with these projects.
item.content:encoded: Are you looking for a fun Raspberry Pi project to try out? Well, the number of projects out there is nearly infinite. So, I’ve narrowed it down to just three for you to get up and running in a couple of days. Here are three Raspberry Pi projects to try out this weekend.

item.title: Your iPhone 17 Might Have a Bigger Battery
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: Are you part of the lucky few?
item.content:encoded: Typically, when Apple arbitrarily removes something from their phones, it doesn't really have much of an excuse for it. This, however, is one of the rare cases where Apple removing something results in a real-life improvement.

item.title: 3 Action-Thriller Movies to Stream on Hulu This Weekend
item.dc:creator: Keeley Brooks
item.description: Guaranteed to get your blood flowing this weekend!
item.content:encoded: As we move closer to the most exciting season of the year—i.e., Halloween (too soon?), I find myself watching a lot of action-thriller movies, craving that unexpected excitement, piqued curiosity, and exhilarating flow of adrenaline. It's a good thing, then, that Hulu is stacked on the pulse-pounders.

item.title: America’s Cheapest Car Still Lets You Drive Stick
item.dc:creator: Adam Gray
item.description: For $17,190, America’s cheapest new car still lets you row your own gears.
item.content:encoded: Manual transmissions are going extinct, and fast. Fewer and fewer cars let you row your own gears, especially on the affordable end of the market. Automakers figure most people just want the convenience of an automatic, so that’s where they put their money.

item.title: Get an 8Bitdo Switch 2-Compatible Controller for 34% Off
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: It works with other consoles and platforms, too.
item.content:encoded: The 8Bitdo Pro 2 Wireless Bluetooth Controller, which is compatible with the Switch 2, is currently available for just $40 on Amazon. This is a big 34% discount from its usual list price of $60. The controller is great, especially since it has Hall Effect Joysticks.

item.title: Please Convince Me I Don’t Need a Metal Gaming Mouse
item.dc:creator: Ismar Hrnjicevic
item.description: I don't need it, I don't need it, I definitely don't need it...
item.content:encoded: Ultralight gaming mice are the top choice for most online shooters, as their low weight allows for faster, more precise flick shots and quick turns. While plastic is the go-to material, metal mice have recently started appearing—and I badly want one.

Dan Helyer
item.description: There are multiple ways to get in touch with Facebook.
item.content:encoded: Facebook trouble? Whether you have an account-related issue or you want to report a bug, you have a few ways to contact Facebook support. We'll show you what your contact options are

item.title: Can This New Honda Coupe Beat the Mazda MX-5 and Toyota GR86?
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: Honda’s upcoming coupe targets Mazda MX-5 and Toyota GR86, offering agility, sporty handling, and daily practicality.
item.content:encoded: Honda’s revived Prelude is stepping back into the spotlight as an attainable two-door built to capture driving enthusiasts who might otherwise gravitate toward a Mazda MX-5 or Toyota GR86. After years without a dedicated sporty coupe in its lineup, Honda is clearly positioning this car to rekindle the brand’s fun-to-drive reputation while keeping pricing within reach of everyday buyers.

item.title: Amazon Prime Members Can Get 3 Free Months of Kindle Unlimited
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.description: Borrow up to 20 books at a time.
item.content:encoded: Amazon has a bunch of different products and services these days, but its bread and butter is still books. Right now, the company is offering a pretty sweet deal for Prime members that will make it a lot easier and cheaper to load up your Kindle with ebooks.
